description:
Fading footsteps. Overlapping memories. It all started with the promise made that day. One who couldn`t be honest with herself. One who constantly looked away from the truth. Will Yuu and Suzuka be able to face their true feelings?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Okay for Me to Be Moe for Little Sisters
J`ai le droit d`aimer les petites sœurs
Ore wa Imouto ni Moete Ii
